params.validUntil: Timestamp until which the user will be a valid member

freeze(address,address).notice: Freeze a user balance. Frozen users cannot receive nor send tokens

isFrozen(address,address).notice: Returns whether the user's tokens are frozen

isMember(address,address).notice: Returns whether the user is a valid member of the token

updateMember(address,address,uint64).notice: Add a member. Non-members cannot receive tokens, but can send tokens to valid members
